publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5799 Sandra White: Gold for Glasgow—That the Parliament applauds everyone at Glasgow City Marketing Bureau (GCMB) for their dedication to and passion for Glasgow, which has resulted in GCMB being crowned best UK convention bureau 2010 at the M&IT Industry Awards for the fourth year running; believes Glasgow to be one of the world’s leading cities for international conferences and events; further believes that this award demonstrates the huge international potential and appeal of Glasgow as both a place to do business and to visit, as evidenced by some of its many accolades, including being one of the top 10 cities in the world to visit according to Lonely Planet’s Best in Travel 2009, and recognises the important cultural and economic benefit that such titles bring to both Glasgow and Scotland as a whole. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson*, Bob Doris*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-5799 Gold for Glasgow (lodged on 23 February 2010) Rob Gibson*, Charlie Gordon*, Hugh Henry*
